1.title: Hydrogen
1.mouseover: Your chemistry textbooks are WRONG! Hydrogen doesn't want two electrons in its outer shell. It doesn't want zero electrons in its outer shell. It just wants a friend.

3.title: Lithium
3.mouseover: Fun fact: Any other element in place of lithium would either be lying or lyeing. I'll let you figure out what that means.

4.title: Congeners
4.mouseover: Manganese: Important for brain signaling / Technetium: DANGEROUSLY RADIOACTIVE
